q: . And with my children, that was uncomfortable." Kelsey and Camille are still legally married and working through the finances of their pending divorce. Kelsey wants to marry Kayte as early as next month. The kids seem to be doing OK, Kelsey said in an interview with David Letterman . "We've been spending quite a bit of time with them, Kayte and I. Kayte's my new girl, and we're planning to get married soon."

judicial review into the police handling of the investigation. The Times investigation cited several former NoW journalists stating that Andy Coulson had "actively encouraged" phone hacking. "In fact", the newspaper continued, an examination based on police records, court documents and interviews with investigators and reporters shows that Britain's revered police agency failed to pursue leads suggesting that one of the country's most powerful newspapers was routinely listening in on its citizens. This was followed by a Channel 4 "Dispatches" programme, in which it was alleged that Andy Coulson had personally listened to hacked messages. At practice Wednesday, Michael Vick loosened up throwing passes to Falcons quarterback Matt Ryan, who is making his first Pro Bowl appearance in his third season and succeeded Michael Vick in Atlanta. Matt is great. The coaching staff is great. We're just having a good time, he said. "I like what they're doing in the offence and it's been easy. We're going to go out and try to have fun and everybody enjoy each other." Michael Vick
